articles.description: CIUDAD VICTORIA, Mexico (AP) — The U.S. consulate in Nuevo Laredo said Thursday U.S. government personnel remained under “enhanced restrictions on their movements,” a day after gunbattles in the city across the border from Laredo, Texas left six people dead.
